plot outline: One day two old friends named Dhoroni and Hobu met after a long time. Dhoroni told his friend that he wanted his son to be married to Hobu's daughter. He sent his son Geet to his friend's house. There Geet met Radha and he loved her. One day radha lost her gold necklace. Beside Dhoroni and Habu's home lived a very rich women. She had only one grand son. One day she was very ill. So her grand son came back to his country. He camed back and opened a new dance club where he met Radha and fell in love. But Geet observed everything and he was jealous. In the mean time Joy's grandmother died. Geet left home and had an accident. Then he was admitted in a hospital. Then Joy came to know that Radha loved Geet. Then Geet and Radha was happly married and Joy to his girlfriend Suzie.
title: Mon

She had only one grand son. One day she was very ill. So her grand son came back to his country. He camed back and opened a new dance club where he met Radha and fell in love. But Geet observed everything and he was jealous. In the mean time Joy's grandmother died. Geet left home and had an accident. Then he was admitted in a hospital.
